summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 8 November to end of Monday 8 November GMT
description: Monday is forecast to be cloudy with sunny intervals.<br/><br/>There may be some build-up of particulates later in the evening due to poor dispersion of local emissions in very light winds.<br/><br/>Overall, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
